data.message: Just got the notification that Facebook is now sorting my notifications by what YOU think is relevant or important to me! I WANT MY NOTIFICATIONS IN CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER - THAT is what is important TO ME! Please at  least give us the choice of how they should be sorted or return it to the way it was!

replies.message: Hi Thomas. We appreciate your feedback. Please let our team know more about how we can improve your Facebook experience in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2zeNshJ. -Anna
